MdIntegrator Class Reference
Molecular Dynamics Integrators

Detailed Description

Abstract base for molecular dynamics integrators.

Definition at line 30 of file MdIntegrator.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void setup ( ) [inline, virtual]

Initialize internal state, if any.

This method should be called just before entering the main MD loop. Empty default implementation.

Reimplemented in NphIntegrator, NveVvIntegrator, NvtDpdVvIntegrator, and NvtNhIntegrator.
